text: MATH312: Quiz 2 10pts; 20 mts Nov 8, 2023 1. Fill in the blanks (2+3=5 pts) 1 a) 37100 is congruent to —————— modulo 17. Your answer should be in terms of the least positive residue modulo 17. 1b) A solution for the congruence x ≡ 206 mod 210 is ——————. 1 2. Answer the following: (1+2+2=5 pts) You must show your work or justify your answer. 2a) If p is a prime, then 1p−1+2p−1+· · ·+(p−1)p−1 ≡ −−−−−−−−−−−− mod p. 2b) 217 − 1 ≡ − − − − − − − − − − − − − mod 341. 2c) Deﬁne a Carmichael number and give an example. OR 2c) Find the remainder of 67! when divided by 71. 2
